Articles.Content: NOTE: PLEASE REPORT ALL BUGS IN THIS THREAD; HIGHLY APPRECIATED; MOD IS FULLY COMPATIBLE WITH 1.2.2, NO UPDATE NEEDED. *Disclaimer: 70% of the modeling work and texturing and config writing was done by Nazari1382. All I did was change/add some parts and configs. Any possible additions in the future would still follow Nazari1382's style and use his textures.* I'm personally using this mod everyday for various purposes and goals. It provides a very good part collection for extraordinary contraptions, sci-fi 60's style space stations, and ground bases. One can even use for underwater bases on Eve or Laythe or even Kerbin! All in all, it is a perfect part selection for most crazy purposes. Changes to the original part-pack: **removed Aurora thruster** **added 1x1 glass panel** **removed mk1 orbital enclosure** **added 4x4 panel** **added a lot of glass domes** **added better tri-panel** **fixed mod directory** **added flags** **proper balancing** **techtree integration** **glass tube now has fuel crossfeed capabilities** **replaced glass tube with fresh model** **compatibility with KSP 1.3.1** **TweakScale integration** Change log from 1.8 (and 1.9): **fully compatible with KSP 1.3.1** **new dome model** **4 total dome sizes (10m, 3.75m, 2.5m, 1.25m)** Download: [SpaceDock](http://spacedock.info/mod/312/Glass%20Panes%20and%20Enclosures%20%28GPE%29) [CurseForge](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects/glass-panes-and-enclosures-gpe) Screenshots: [Imgur](http://imgur.com/a/wZDua) (old, will update with 2.0 release) License: Creative Commons (CC) 3.0 Original partpack: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/26641-Glass-Box-Enclosure-and-Glass-panels-mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/26641-Glass-Box-Enclosure-and-Glass-panels-mod) **Edited March 25, 2018 by 2001kraft** Compatibility

Fixed 1x1 panel geometry!

It was a little bit too thin ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Migrated all parts to the Structural tab. No more confusion! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

- - - Updated - - -

Any opinions? I need feedback xD

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T19:36:25Z" title="05/01/2015 07:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by 2001kraft**
Cool, but glass breaking would be an awesome feature, or even cracking. And it should be kinda heavy and have a low crash tolerance (I haven't downloaded it yet, I'm on my phone).

You'll be happy to see that it matches your requirements. And yes, glass cracking would indeed be a nice feature. (if i knew how to do it ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) )

> 
> You'll be happy to see that it matches your requirements. And yes, glass cracking would indeed be a nice feature. (if i knew how to do it ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) )

Probably a impact-triggered animation would do for the cracking, like the rover wheels get damaged.
Yes, yes. I'll look into the code very soon.
Tomorrow, a new update will be released ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
oooh if only my ram could take another mod
It's not at all RAM-intensive, it's just a couple low-poly, non-detailed-physics parts ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

***Version 1.0.6 is released!***

Removed Mk1 orbital enclosure.

I have a very inappropriate brain that leads me to politically-incorrect places...

Anyone else see his sample pix of rectangular glass constructs and think their spaceport needs a Kerbin World Trade Center as a spaceplane target? 

/Sorry.

> 
> Anyone else see his sample pix of rectangular glass constructs and think their spaceport needs a Kerbin World Trade Center as a spaceplane target?

lol.

10chars.

***Update 1.1.1 is released!***

Update fixes 1x1 Panel bug where the 1x1 panel would become 2x2 panel on launch/undo action.

Update adds 4x4 Panel with fuel crossfeed capabilities.
Preparing big update with glass dome and flags and proper mod directory ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
No update today, however was working all day on the glass dome! I hope you guys like it when it comes out! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Awesome job I love the glass stuff very good for orbital stations ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
